title: Select which champs to queue for in OfA
body:
Or, more simply, which champs you will NOT play (possibly a smaller list, depending on the player). It can be any number. Doesn't matter. You get matched with players that have overlapping pools of champions they are willing to play, and then League allows players to only vote for champions common to all 5 pools.

I mainly play featured game modes to try knew things, not play Yorick the bazillionth time. Riot wants to whine about certain champs being spammed in URF? At least there I'm guaranteed my pick! What are they doing about OfA?

I don't care if I have to wait longer in queue to get a champion. I'd probably queue for any of a hundred champions, so for me, the extended queue wouldn't be that much longer anyway. Just as long as I don't have to play the other 20 again that everyone gravitates towards to no end.
